# Preamble {.unnumbered}

The course Financial Derivatives delves into the intricacies of derivative instruments,
focusing on both fixed and conditional contracts, including forwards, futures, swaps,
and options. It explores the utilization of derivatives within financial markets,
particularly for hedging against various risks. Students will gain a comprehensive
understanding of the essence and valuation of financial derivatives, along with detailed
insights into the exchange trading mechanisms for futures and options.

Upon completing this course, the student will be able to:

- define financial derivatives and understand their specific characteristics
- explain the differences between fixed future contracts and options
- price financial derivatives
- suggest their use
